Text:
thx for the upload @GngnmStyl
only one question.. is there a way to install dlc Captain Scarlett and her Pirates Booty ?

@fercasas
yeah install in this order:
1.game
2.dlc
3.update 6
4.update 6 crack
5.winderlands
This fix works great, I can finally play on Win8 x64. Thanks a million.
Just installed Windows 8 Pro x64 today and your fix for Windows 8 works great. Thanks!

On Windows 7 64-bit, I installed the game, overwrote steam_api.dll and added winderlands8.dll to the Win32 directory and I still get MSVCR100.dll error message:/
I can't get this to work on Windows 8 Pro 32bit. When I hit Play in the launcher it closes and nothing happens. I did exactly as gutko wrote in the fifth post.
Not working here too. Did exactly the instructions. Nothing happens!

"I still get MSVCR100.dll error"

Nothing to do with the crack. It means you didnt install Visual Studio 2010 which is necessary to play the game.
